attributes.action: not pick on 4x4 cars without also increasing the road tax on ALL gas guzzling cars including V6 Jags etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of just increasing the tax on 4x4 cars, please do the same to all large engine (above 2.5l engine capacity) modes of transport. This would give parity across all large cars and not just a certain section of these vehicles.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
